General.Name: DingZing Advanced Materials Inc.
General.Description: DingZing Advanced Materials Inc. researches, develops, produces, and sells composite materials and technical films for various industries in Taiwan. Its products include Provecta series of advanced technical films that provide an alternative to rubber and traditional plastic; Advanta technical films for clothing applications; Orkesta series of composite materials with a layer of hot melt film designed to replace conventional materials, such as microfiber or genuine leather; Perfola air hoses and hydration tubes; Aldura transmission and conveyor belts; and DingZing DZ seals. The company's products are used in apparel, automotive, electronic, wearable, footwear, healthcare, outdoor and sport goods, and furniture and bedding applications. DingZing Advanced Materials Inc. is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
